description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to
develop a music program for grades 5-12.  Each week the student observes a music teacher in a
local school and then returns to teach that class using an approved plan. Required field
experience component. Prerequisite: Education 330, 355. Offered annually in the first half of the
fullname: Teaching of Music in the Middle and High School (0.5)
